specialServiceTypes.description:
Special services requested for the shipment.
Example:
  • HOLD_AT_LOCATION
  • RETURN_SHIPMENT
  • BROKER_SELECT_OPTION
  • CALL_BEFORE_DELIVERY
  • COD
  • CUSTOM_DELIVERY_WINDOW

click here to see Shipment Special Service Types

attributes.description: Use this attribute to specify if the Trade documents will be uploaded post the shipment.

attachedDocuments.description: Use this object to specify the details regarding already uploded document(s). This object is required if the documents are uploaded Pre-Shipment uploaded documents. It is recommended to provide values for all elements under this object.

documentType.description: Specify document type for the uploaded document. It should match with the type of uploaded document associated with documentId.

documentReference.description:
Specify the reference for the uploaded document.This is for the customer to reference their uploaded docs when they retrieve them. Could be anything, order number, po number, whatever the customer used to tie the document to something they would use.
Note: Ensure to supply document references in case of Pre-Shipment document upload.

Example: Reference

description.description:
Specify additional information about the uploaded document for better understanding.
Example: Certificate of Origin is uploaded for country of manufacturing verification.

documentId.description:
This is the uploaded document ID value.
Example: 090927d680038c61

items.description: Specify the document upload reference details.

requestedDocumentTypes.description:
Indicate the types of shipping documents produced for the shipper by FedEx. The types of shipping documents are copied back to the shipper in the shipment result data.
Note: For more information document types, refer business overview topic - Shipping and Customs Documents.

etdDetail.description: Use this object to specify all information on how the electronic Trade document references used with the shipment.

merchantPhoneNumber.description:
This is the merchant phone number and required for Email Return Labels.
Example: 19012635656

allowedSpecialService.description:
Indicate the allowed (merchant-authorized) special services which may be selected when the subsequent shipment is created.
Only services represented in EmailLabelAllowedSpecialServiceType will be controlled by this list.

returnEmailDetail.description: These are email details for the return shipment.

reason.description:
Specify the reason for the return.
Note: There is no validation for reason. Recommended length is 60 alpha-numeric characters
Example: Wrong color or size.

rma.description:
This is a Return Merchant Authorization (RMA) for the return shipment.
Reason for the requirement is mandatory.

shipDatestamp.description:
This is the ship date for the outbound shipment associated with a return shipment. The format is YYYY-MM-DD.
Example: 2019-10-01

trackingNumber.description:
This is the tracking number associated with this package.
Example: 49XXX0000XXX20032835

returnAssociationDetail.description: Specifies the details of an outbound shipment in order to associate the return shipment to it.

returnType.description: This is the return Type. Required to be set to PRINT_RETURN_LABEL for printed return label shipments. For email return label shipments returnType must be set to PENDING and pendingShipmentDetail must be set to EMAIL.

returnShipmentDetail.description: Use this object for specifying return shipment details.

recipient.description: The descriptive data for the recipient of the shipment and the physical location for the shipment destination.

streetLines.description:
This is the combination of number, street name, etc. Maximum length per line is 35.
Example: 10 FedEx Parkway, Suite 302.

Note:

  • At least one line is required.
  • Streetlines more than 3 will be ignored.
  • Empty lines should not be included
  • For SmartPost Shipments, only 30 characters from the individual street lines will be printed on the labels.

city.description:
This is a placeholder for City Name.
Note: This is conditional and not required in all the requests.
Note: It is recommended for Express shipments for the most accurate ODA and OPA surcharges.
Example: Beverly Hills

stateOrProvinceCode.description:
This is a placeholder for state or province code.
Example: CA.
click here to see State or Province Code

postalCode.description:
This is the postal code.
Note: This is Optional for non postal-aware countries. Maximum length is 10.
Example: 65247
click here to see Postal aware countries

countryCode.description:
This is the two-letter country code.
Maximum length is 2.
Example: US
click here to see Country codes

residential.description: Indicate whether this address is residential (as opposed to commercial).

address.description: This is detailed information on physical location. May be used as an actual physical address (place to which one could go), or as a container of address parts which should be handled as a unit (such as a city-state-ZIP combination within the US).

personName.description:
Specify contact name. Maximum length is 70.
Note: Either the companyName or personName is mandatory.
Example: John Taylor

emailAddress.description:
Specify contact email address. Maximum length is 80.
Example: sample@company.com

phoneExtension.description:
Specify contact phone extension. Maximum length is 6.
Example: 1234

phoneNumber.description:
Specify contact phone number.
Minimum length is 10 and supports Maximum as 15 for certain countries using longer phone numbers.
Note: Recommended Maximum length is 15 and there's no specific validation will be done for the phone number.
Example: 918xxxxx890

companyName.description:
Specify contact company name. Maximum length is 35.
Note: Either the companyName or personName is mandatory.

contact.description: Indicate the contact details for this shipment.

tins.description: This is the tax identification number details.

number.description:
Specify tax ID number. Maximum length is 18.
Example: 123567

tinType.description: Indicate the type of tax identification number.

usage.description: Specify the reason for using the tax identification number in shipment processing.

effectiveDate.description:
Specify the tax ID effective date.
Example: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00

expirationDate.description:
Specify the tax ID expiration date.
Example: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00

deliveryInstructions.description:
Specify the delivery instructions to be added with the shipment. Use with Ground Home Delivery.
Example: Delivery Instructions

allOf.description: The descriptive information of the recipient for the shipment and the physical location for the package destination.

streetLines.description:
This is the combination of number, street name, etc.
Note: At least one line is required and streetlines more than 3 will be ignored. Empty lines should not be included. Maximum length per line is 35.
Example: [10 FedEx Parkway, Suite 302, .etc.]

countryCode.description:
The two-letter code used to identify a country. Maximum length is 2.
Example: US
click here to see Country codes

companyName.description: Identifies the company this contact is associated with. Maximum length is 35.

personName.description: Identifies the contact person's name. Maximum length is 70.

phoneNumber.description: Identifies the phone number associated with this contact. Maximum length is 10.

deliveryOnInvoiceAcceptanceDetail.description: Indicate the Delivery On Invoice Acceptance detail. Recipient is required for Delivery On Invoice Special service.

licenseOrExemptionNumber.description:
The export or license number for the ITAR shipment.
Minimum length is 5 characters.
Maximum length is 21 characters.
Example: 9871234

internationalTrafficInArmsRegulationsDet.description: These are International Traffic In Arms Regulations shipment service details.

pendingShipmentType.description:
This is Pending Shipment Type. Must include the value 'EMAIL' for email return shipments.
Not applicable for other types of shipments.

processingOptions.description: Use this object to allow the Email Label shipment originator,  specify if the Email label shipment completer can make modifications to editable shipment data.

types.description:
This is the recommended document Type.
click here to see shipment document type

recommendedDocumentSpecification.description: These are documents that are recommended to be included with the shipment.

recipients.description: This is Email label recipient email address, shipment role, & language locale details. Atleast one entry must be specified.

emailAddress.description:
This is recipient email address for notifying the return label. Maximum length 200 characters.
Example: neena@abc.com

optionsRequested.description: These are to indicate how the email notifications for the pending shipment to be processed.

role.description: This is to specify Recipient role in the shipment.Shipment completor role is needed when we pass shipment initiator. We cannot use shipment initiator alone.

locale.description:
These are locale details.
Example: 'en_US'
click here to see locales
Note: If the locale is left blank or an invalid locale is entered, an error message is returned in response.

items.description: These are the recipient details for the online email return label.

message.description: This is an optional personalized message to be included in the email to the recipient.

emailLabelDetail.description:
These are specific information about the pending email label.
Required when PendingShipmentType is EMAIL.
Not applicable for CreateTag.

attachedDocuments.description: These are the reference document details with the shipment.

documentType.description: This is the uploaded document type.

documentReference.description:
Specify the reference for the uploaded document.
Example: Reference

description.description:
This is the document description of the attached document.
Example: PRO FORMA INVOICE

documentId.description:
This is the uploaded document ID value.
Example: 090927d680038c61

items.description: Specify the document upload reference details.

expirationTimeStamp.description:
This is the Email Label expiration date. The maximum expiration date for an Email Return Label must be greater of equal to the day of the label request and not greater than 2 years in the future.
Example: 2020-01-01

pendingShipmentDetail.description: This object is used to specify the Pending Shipment Type for Email label.

locationId.description:
This is an alphanumeric identifier used for Location/Facility Identification.
Example: YBZA
Note:
  • For HAL Shipment, Location ID is REQUIRED to ensure packages are delivered to the right location.
  • Use endpoint [Find Location] in [Location Search API], to find the correct location ID for your shipment.

personName.description:
Specify contact person name.
Recommended length is 70.
Note: There's no specific validation for the person name.
Example: John Taylor

emailAddress.description:
Specify contact email address. Maximum length is 80.
Example: sample@company.com

phoneNumber.description:
Specify contact phone number.
Minimum length is 10 and supports maximum of 15 for certain countries using longer phone numbers.
Note: Recommended Maximum length is 15 and there's no specific validation will be done for the phone number.
Example: 918xxxxx890

phoneExtension.description:
Specify contact phone extension.
Note: Recommended length is 6. There's no specific validation for the phone extension.
Example: 1234

faxNumber.description:
Specify contact fax number.
Note: Recommended length is 15. There's no specific validation for the fax number.
Example: 1234567890

companyName.description:
Specify contact company name.
Recommended length is 35.
Note: There's no specific validation for the company name.

contact.description: Indicate the contact details of the shipper.

streetLines.description:
This is the combination of number, street name, etc.
Note: At least one line is required and streetlines more than 3 will be ignored. Empty lines should not be included. Maximum length per line is 35.
Example: [10 FedEx Parkway, Suite 302, .etc.]

city.description:
This is a placeholder for City Name.
Note: This is conditional and not required in all the requests.
Note: It is recommended for Express shipments for the most accurate ODA and OPA surcharges.
Example: Beverly Hills

stateOrProvinceCode.description:
This is a placeholder for State or Province code.
Example: CA
click here to see State or Province Code

postalCode.description:
Indicate the Postal code. This is Optional for non postal-aware countries. Maximum length is 10.
Example: 65247
click here to see Postal aware countries

countryCode.description:
This is the two-letter country code.
Maximum length is 2.
Example: US
click here to see Country codes

residential.description: Indicate whether this address is residential (as opposed to commercial).

address.description: This is detailed information on physical location. May be used as an actual physical address (place to which one could go), or as a container of address parts which should be handled as a unit (such as a city-state-ZIP combination within the U.S.).

locationContactAndAddress.description: Specifies the contact and address details of a location.

locationType.description: Specifies the type of facility at which package/shipment is to be held.

holdAtLocationDetail.description:
Use this object to specify required information for a shipment to be held at destination FedEx location.
Note: This object HoldAtLocationDetail is Required, when HOLD_AT_LOCATION is chosen in the specialServiceTypes.

rateLevelType.description: Specify which level the rate to be applied.

chargeLevelType.description: Specify which level the charges to be applied.

addTransportationChargesDetail.description: Use this object to specify C.O.D. transportation charges.

codRecipient.description: Descriptive data of the Cash On Delivery along with their details of the physical location.

streetLines.description:
This is the combination of number, street name, etc. Maximum length per line is 35.
Example: 10 FedEx Parkway, Suite 302.

Note:

  • At least one line is required.
  • Streetlines more than 3 will be ignored.
  • Empty lines should not be included
  • For SmartPost Shipments, only 30 characters from the individual street lines will be printed on the labels.

This is a placeholder for City Name.
Note: This is conditional and not required in all the requests.
Note: It is recommended for Express shipments for the most accurate ODA and OPA surcharges.
Example: Beverly Hills

stateOrProvinceCode.description:
This is a placeholder for state or province code.
Example: CA.

postalCode.description:
This is the postal code.
Note: This is Optional for non postal-aware countries. Maximum length is 10.
Example: 65247

This is the two-letter country code.
Maximum length is 2.
Example: US

address.description: This is detailed information on physical location. May be used as an actual physical address (place to which one could go), or as a container of address parts which should be handled as a unit (such as a city-state-ZIP combination within the US).

Example: 918xxxxx890

companyName.description:
Specify contact company name. Maximum length is 35.
Note: Either the companyName or personName is mandatory.

contact.description: Indicate the contact details for this shipment.

value.description:
This is the account number. Maximum length is 9.
Example: Your account number

accountNumber.description: This is FedEx Account number details.

tins.description: This is the tax identification number details.

number.description:
Specify tax ID number. Maximum length is 18.
Example: 123567

tinType.description: Indicate the type of tax identification number.

usage.description: Specify the reason for using the tax identification number in shipment processing.

effectiveDate.description:
Specify the tax ID effective date.
Example: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00

expirationDate.description:
Specify the tax ID expiration date.
Example: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00

remitToName.description: Specify the name of the person or company receiving the secured/unsecured funds payment.

codCollectionType.description:
Specify the preference type based on funds to be collected by FedEx upon shipment delivery.
Note:
  • Ground shipments accept only CASH as the COD collection type.
  • Express shipments accept ANY and GUARANTEED_FUNDS as the COD collection type.

personName.description:
Specify contact person name.
Recommended length is 70.
Note: There's no specific validation for the person name.
Example: John Taylor

emailAddress.description:
Specify contact email address. Maximum length is 80.
Example: sample@company.com

phoneNumber.description:
Specify contact phone number.
Minimum length is 10 and supports maximum of 15 for certain countries using longer phone numbers.
Note: Recommended Maximum length is 15 and there's no specific validation will be done for the phone number.
Example: 918xxxxx890

phoneExtension.description:
Specify contact phone extension.
Note: Recommended length is 6. There's no specific validation for the phone extension.
Example: 1234

faxNumber.description:
Specify contact fax number.
Note: Recommended length is 15. There's no specific validation for the fax number.
Example: 1234567890

companyName.description:
Specify contact company name.

Note: There's no specific validation for the company name.

Note: This is conditional and not required in all the requests.

Example: CA

residential.description: Indicate whether this address is residential (as opposed to commercial).

address.description: This is detailed information on physical location. May be used as an actual physical address (place to which one could go), or as a container of address parts which should be handled as a unit (such as a city-state-ZIP combination within the U.S.).

financialInstitutionContactAndAddress.description: Specifies the contact and address details of a location.

amount.description:
This is the amount. Maximum limit is 5 digits before decimal.
Example: 12.45

currency.description:
This is the currency code for the amount.
Example: USD
Click here to see Currency codes

returnReferenceIndicatorType.description: Indicate return reference type information to include on the COD return shipping label.

shipmentCodAmount.description: Indicate the COD amount for this shipment.

amount.description:
This is the amount. Maximum limit is 5 digits before decimal.
Example: 12.45

currency.description:
This is the currency code for the amount.
Example: USD
Click here to see Currency codes

shipmentCODDetail.description: This is the shipment level COD detail.

units.description: This is the package weight unit. For Dry Ice the unit of measure is KG.

value.description:
This is package weight. Maximum length is 99999.
Example: 68.25

totalWeight.description: These are the package weight details.

packageCount.description:
Indicates the total number of packages in the shipment that contain dry ice.
Example: 12

shipmentDryIceDetail.description:
This is the descriptive data required for a FedEx shipment containing dangerous materials. This element is required when SpecialServiceType DRY_ICE is selected.

Note:

  • Dry Ice is a Package level Special Service for Domestic and International shipments.
  • Dry Ice must be declared at both Shipment and Package level for International MPS shipments to print the compliance statement on Airway Bill labels.

licenseOrPermitExpirationDate.description:
Indicate the expiration date for the license or permit. The format is YYYY-MM-DD.
Example: "2019-12-03"

licenseOrPermitNumber.description:
Indicate License Or Permit Number for the commodity being exported.
Example: 11

entryNumber.description:
Indicate Entry Number for the export.
Example: 125

foreignTradeZoneCode.description:
Indicate the Foreign Trade Zone Code.
Example: US

internationalControlledExportDetail.description:
Use this object to specify International Controlled Export shipment Details.
Note: licenseOrPermitExpirationDate and licenseOrPermitNumber are not required when type is WAREHOUSE_WITHDRAWAL.

areaCode.description: Indicate the area code for the phone number.

localNumber.description: Indicate the local phone number for contacting in the event of an emergency. Maximum length  is 10.

extension.description: Indicate the extension for the phone number.

personalIdentificationNumber.description: Indicate the Personal Identification Number associated with the phone number.

phoneNumber.description:
Indicate the phone number. Only numeric values allowed.
Note that phoneNumber is mandatory when homedeliveryPremiumType is DATE_CERTAIN or EVENING.

deliveryDate.description:
This is delivery date. Required for FedEx Date Certain Home Delivery. Valid dates are Monday to Sunday.
There may be a delay in delivery on Sundays to locations that are geographically difficult to access.
Example: 2019-06-26

homedeliveryPremiumType.description: This is Home Delivery Premium Type. It allows to specify additional premimum service options for the home delivery shipment. Can specify Evening delivery or a Date certain, or can specify appointment for the delivery.

homeDeliveryPremiumDetail.description: These are Special service elements for FedEx Ground Home Delivery shipments. If selected, element homedeliveryPremiumType is mandatory.

description:
Specify the special services requested at the shipment level.
If the shipper is requesting a special service which requires additional data (such as the COD amount), the shipment special service type must be present in the specialServiceTypes collection, and the supporting detail must be provided in the appropriate sub-object below.
RETURN_SHIPMENT is required for creating return shipments.
